item.title: Ananke vs the other Hugoes
item.description: I tried many modules this weekend. Let’s see how Ananke goes. seems SUPER simple. So featureless wrt to others, but also so easier to use. Uses FormSpree for contact form [contact]. Works like a charm. images. See [/posts/first-scuba/](Scuba diving) Scuba2 page to see if it works. aa What I’ve tried so far: My Hugo websites I’ve tried so far Theme Website Stars Description Ananke TODO ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Historically the first ive tried.
